metadata.titleCn: 泛第三极（65国）土壤可蚀性因子（K）图（2021）
metadata.description: The soil erodibility factor (K) dataset of the pan-third pole area  is calculated based on the soil properties downloaded from website of the international soil reference and Information Center (ISRIC)（https://files.isric.org/soilgrids/latest/data/） with 7.5 arc second resolution. And the dataset used in the calculation includes soil clay content (%), silt content (%), and sand content (%), soil organic carbon content (g / kg) and soil texture class. By usint the soil erodibility factor algorithm proposed by Wischmeier (1978) in the second edition of USLE manual and the soil erodibility factor calculation tool (k_tool) developed in this project, a soil erodibility factor map was generated with a resolution of  30 arc second (about 1000m) . The soil erodibility factor data of Pan third pole 65 countries is the essential data for calculating soil erosion rate based on CSLE, it is also the basic data for analyzing soil characteristics.
metadata.descriptionCn: 泛第三极土壤可蚀性因子（K）数据集，基于国际土壤信息参比中心（International Soil Reference and Information Centre, ISRIC）网站（https://files.isric.org/soilgrids/latest/data/）下载的7.5弧秒分辨率土壤属性数据计算，所用数据包括土壤黏粒含量（%）、粉粒含量（%）、砂粒含量（%）、土壤有机碳含量（g/kg）、土壤质地类型。利用Wischmeier（1978）在USLE手册第二版中提出的土壤可蚀性因子算法、本项目研发的土壤可蚀性因子计算工具（K_Tool），计算得到与输入数据分辨率（30弧秒，尺度地区约1000m）相同分辨率的土壤可蚀性因子图。泛第三极土壤可蚀性因子数据，是基于CSLE进行土壤侵蚀速率计算的必备数据，同时也是分析泛第三极土壤特征的基础数据。

background: Rock fragments (>2 mm diameter) are an important component of soil, and its presence has a significant impact on soil erosion and sediment yield. So it is essential to take into full account content of the rock fragments for accurate calculation of soil erodibility factor (K). Soil erodibility factor (K) is a basic parameter in models like USLE, RUSLE, EPIC, and AGNPS, and its value is essential data for regional soil erosion surveys and mapping using models like USLE/CSLE. Since Wischmeier formally proposed the soil erodibility factor (K), numerous studies have been conducted both domestically and internationally, resulting in several methods for estimating soil erodibility factors. Mature algorithms include the USLE-K algorithm, RUSLE2-K algorithm, EPIC-K algorithm, and algorithms based on average geometric particle size. These algorithms calculate the soil erodibility K value based on soil physical and chemical properties (particle size, organic matter, structure, and permeability, etc.). A large body of research indicates that the content of rock fragments in the soil profile and rock fragment cover on the soil surface significantly affect soil hydrology, soil erosion and sediment yield processes, and land use. Brakensiek et al. established a method for estimating saturated hydraulic conductivity based on the content of rock fragments in the profile. Poesen et al. demonstrated that rock fragment cover on the soil surface can reduce soil erodibility and can be quantitatively estimated using an exponential decay function. Zhou and Shao found that when the content of rock fragments in the soil exceeds 40%, the soil infiltration rate decreases, and the soil's saturated hydraulic conductivity increases. Jomaa et al.'s laboratory flume experiments showed that rock fragment cover can mitigate raindrop impact, reduce surface water flow, and decrease runoff transport capacity, thereby reducing soil erosion. Hlaváčiková et al. discovered that rock fragments in the profile can reduce saturated hydraulic conductivity, thereby increasing surface runoff and erosion sediment yield.
research objective: In this paper, based on the data available of the content of rock fragments and classes of soil texture with a resolution of 30 arc-second, influence of the content of rock fragments, including rock fragments in the soil profile (RFP) and gravels on the surface of the soil (SC), on K was assessed at a global scale, using the equation (Brakensiek, 1986) of the relationship between saturated hydraulic conductivity and grade of soil permeability, and the equation (Poesen) of soil erodibility attenuation under a rock fragment cover. The joint effect of rock fragments in profile and gravels on the surface reduced the soil erosion rate by 11.8% in the 6 sample areas. In plotting regional soil erosion maps, it is essential to take both of the two into account so as to improve accuracy of the mapping.
challenges: Despite Römkens et al. mentioning the influence of rock fragments on soil erodibility factors in the RUSLE manual and decomposing it into the effects of rock fragment content in the soil profile and rock fragment cover on the soil surface, studies on soil erodibility factor calculation and mapping have not considered the impact of profile rock fragments and rock fragment cover on soil erodibility. To date, there is still no global correction method and result for the calculation value of soil erodibility factors considering rock fragment content.
methods: In this paper, based on the data available of the content of rock fragments and classes of soil texture with a resolution of 30 arc-second, influence of the content of rock fragments, including rock fragments in the soil profile (RFP) and gravels on the surface of the soil (SC), on K was assessed at a global scale, using the equation (Brakensiek, 1986) of the relationship between saturated hydraulic conductivity and grade of soil permeability, and the equation (Poesen) of soil erodibility attenuation under a rock fragment cover.
dataset: The basic data used in this study is SoilGrids released by ISRIC, including soil type maps and soil property maps (surface layer 0-15 cm and soil surface), etc. The latest version of this data has an original resolution of 7.5 arc seconds, which was resampled to 30 arc seconds during the analysis process.
findings: Results show: (1) The existence of rock fragments in the soil increased K by 4.43% and soil permeability by 5.68% on average in grade and lowering soil saturated hydraulic conductivity by 11.57% by reducing water infiltration rate of the soil and increasing surface runoff. The gravels on the surface of the mountain land and desert/gobi reduced K by 18.7% by protecting the soil from splashing of rain drops and scrubbing of runoff; so once the content of rock fragments in the soil profile and gravels on the surface of the land are taken into account in calculation, soil K may be 5.52% lower; (2) In the areas dominated with the effect of rock fragments, about 62.7% of the global land area, soil K decreased by 0.0091(t·hm2·h)·(hm–2·MJ–1·mm–1) on average, while in the area affected mainly by rock fragments in profile, about 31.1% of the global land area, soil K increased by 0.0019(t·hm2·h)·(hm–2·MJ–1·mm–1); and (3) The joint effect of rock fragments in profile and gravels on the surface reduced the soil erosion rate by 11.8% in the 6 sample areas.
backgroundCn: 岩石碎片（直径大于2毫米）是土壤的重要组成部分，其存在对土壤侵蚀和沉积物产量有显著影响。因此，在准确计算土壤侵蚀性因子（K）时，必须充分考虑岩石碎片的含量。土壤侵蚀性因子（K）是USLE、RUSLE、EPIC和AGNPS等模型中的基本参数，其值是使用USLE/CSLE等模型进行区域土壤侵蚀调查和制图的重要数据。自Wischmeier正式提出土壤侵蚀性因子（K）以来，国内外进行了大量研究，形成了多种估算土壤侵蚀性因子的的方法。成熟的算法包括USLE-K算法、RUSLE2-K算法、EPIC-K算法以及基于平均几何粒径的算法。这些算法根据土壤的物理和化学性质（粒径、有机质、结构和渗透性等）计算土壤侵蚀性K值。大量研究表明，土壤剖面中的岩石碎片含量和土壤表面的岩石碎片覆盖显著影响土壤水文、土壤侵蚀和沉积物产量过程以及土地利用。Brakensiek等人建立了一种基于剖面中岩石碎片含量估算饱和水力导 conductivity的方法。Poesen等人证明，土壤表面的岩石碎片覆盖可以降低土壤侵蚀性，并可以使用指数衰减函数进行定量估算。Zhou和Shao发现，当土壤中岩石碎片含量超过40%时，土壤的入渗率降低，而土壤的饱和水力导 conductivity增加。Jomaa等人的实验室水槽实验表明，岩石碎片覆盖可以减轻雨滴冲击，减少地表水流，并降低径流输送能力，从而减少土壤侵蚀。Hlaváčiková等人发现，剖面中的岩石碎片可以降低饱和水力导 conductivity，从而增加地表径流和侵蚀沉积物产量。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，基于30弧秒分辨率的岩石碎片含量和土壤质地类别的数据，评估了岩石碎片含量，包括土壤剖面中的岩石碎片（RFP）和土壤表面的砾石（SC）对饱和水力导度（K）的影响，使用了Brakensiek（1986）关于饱和水力导度与土壤渗透性等级之间关系的方程，以及Poesen关于岩石碎片覆盖下土壤侵蚀性衰减的方程。在6个样本区域中，剖面中的岩石碎片和表面砾石的联合效应使土壤侵蚀率降低了11.8%。在绘制区域土壤侵蚀图时，考虑这两者是至关重要的，以提高制图的准确性。
challengesCn: 尽管Römkens等人在RUSLE手册中提到岩石碎片对土壤侵蚀性因素的影响，并将其分解为土壤剖面中的岩石碎片含量和土壤表面的岩石碎片覆盖的影响，但在土壤侵蚀性因素的计算和制图研究中，尚未考虑剖面岩石碎片和岩石碎片覆盖对土壤侵蚀性的影响。迄今为止，仍然没有考虑岩石碎片含量的土壤侵蚀性因素计算值的全球修正方法和结果。
methodsCn: 在本文中，基于30弧秒分辨率的岩石碎片含量和土壤质地类别的数据，评估了岩石碎片含量（包括土壤剖面中的岩石碎片（RFP）和土壤表面的砾石（SC））对饱和水力导度（K）的影响，使用了Brakensiek（1986）关于饱和水力导度与土壤渗透性等级之间关系的方程，以及Poesen关于岩石碎片覆盖下土壤侵蚀性衰减的方程。
datasetCn: 本研究使用的基本数据是由ISRIC发布的SoilGrids，包括土壤类型图和土壤属性图（表层0-15厘米和土壤表面等）。该数据的最新版本原始分辨率为7.5弧秒，在分析过程中被重采样为30弧秒。
findingsCn: 结果显示：（1）土壤中岩石碎片的存在使土壤的K值平均增加了4.43%，土壤渗透率平均增加了5.68%，但饱和水力导 conductivity降低了11.57%，这是由于减少了土壤的水分渗透率并增加了地表径流。山地和沙漠/戈壁表面的砾石通过保护土壤免受雨滴溅落和径流冲刷，降低了K值18.7%；因此，一旦在计算中考虑土壤剖面中的岩石碎片含量和地表的砾石，土壤K值可能降低5.52%；（2）在岩石碎片影响主导的地区，约占全球陆地面积的62.7%，土壤K值平均降低了0.0091(t·hm2·h)·(hm–2·MJ–1·mm–1)；而在主要受剖面中岩石碎片影响的地区，约占全球陆地面积的31.1%，土壤K值平均增加了0.0019(t·hm2·h)·(hm–2·MJ–1·mm–1)；（3）剖面中岩石碎片和地表砾石的联合效应使6个样本区域的土壤侵蚀率降低了11.8%。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are encountered when incorporating rock fragment content into global soil erodibility factor calculations?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在将岩石碎片含量纳入全球土壤侵蚀性因子计算时，会遇到哪些挑战？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: lack of a global correction method

Example.QuestionEn: Could you illustrate an example of a challenge faced when calculating soil erodibility factors (K) that take into account the rock fragment content?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否举例说明在计算土壤侵蚀性因子（K）时面临的一个挑战，该挑战考虑了岩石碎片含量？
Example.AnswerEn: One example of a challenge is the lack of a global correction method for calculating soil erodibility factors that consider the content of rock fragments. Despite some mentions in manuals like RUSLE, the impact of rock fragment content and cover on soil erodibility has not been fully integrated into global soil mapping methodologies, which presents a significant challenge.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战的例子是缺乏一种全球修正方法来计算土壤侵蚀性因子，该方法考虑了岩石碎片的含量。尽管在像RUSLE这样的手册中有一些提及，但岩石碎片的含量和覆盖对土壤侵蚀性的影响尚未完全融入全球土壤制图方法中，这带来了一个重大挑战。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a dataset that could be used to improve the accuracy of regional soil erosion maps by considering rock fragments in the soil profile and surface gravels?
Example.QuestionCn: 有什么样的数据集可以通过考虑土壤剖面中的岩石碎片和地表砾石来提高区域土壤侵蚀地图的准确性？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset is the SoilGrids data from ISRIC, which includes soil type maps and soil property maps at an original resolution of 7.5 arc-seconds. This data can be resampled to 30 arc-seconds and used to account for the influence of rock fragments in both the soil profile and as surface gravels, thereby improving the accuracy of soil erosion maps.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子是来自ISRIC的SoilGrids数据，其中包括土壤类型图和土壤属性图，原始分辨率为7.5弧秒。该数据可以重采样为30弧秒，并用于考虑岩石碎片在土壤剖面和表面砾石中的影响，从而提高土壤侵蚀图的准确性。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of soil erodibility factor (K) in soil erosion models?
Definition.QuestionCn: 土壤侵蚀性因子（K）在土壤侵蚀模型中的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Soil erodibility factor (K) is a basic parameter in models like USLE, RUSLE, EPIC, and AGNPS, and its value is essential data for regional soil erosion surveys and mapping using models like USLE/CSLE. It is calculated based on soil physical and chemical properties, such as particle size, organic matter, structure, and permeability.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土壤侵蚀性因子（K）是USLE、RUSLE、EPIC和AGNPS等模型中的基本参数，其值是区域土壤侵蚀调查和映射中使用USLE/CSLE模型的重要数据。它是基于土壤的物理和化学性质计算得出的，如颗粒大小、有机质、结构和渗透性。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the challenges in calculating soil erodibility factor (K) when considering rock fragments?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在考虑岩石碎片时，计算土壤侵蚀性因子（K）面临的挑战有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: One of the challenges is that despite the known influence of rock fragments on soil erodibility factors, studies have not fully integrated the impact of profile rock fragments and rock fragment cover on soil erodibility. There is still no global correction method for calculating soil erodibility factors that consider rock fragment content.
Definition.AnswerCn: 其中一个挑战是，尽管已知岩石碎片对土壤侵蚀性因素的影响，但研究尚未充分整合剖面岩石碎片和岩石碎片覆盖对土壤侵蚀性的影响。目前仍然没有全球性的修正方法来计算考虑岩石碎片含量的土壤侵蚀性因素。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in datasets required for calculating soil erodibility factor (K) using the USLE-K algorithm versus algorithms based on average geometric particle size?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用USLE-K算法计算土壤可蚀性因子(K)与基于平均几何粒径的算法所需数据集的差异是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The USLE-K algorithm primarily requires data on soil physical and chemical properties such as particle size, organic matter, structure, and permeability. In contrast, algorithms based on average geometric particle size may focus more specifically on the geometric distribution of soil particles, potentially requiring different or additional data on soil texture and composition.
Comparison.AnswerCn: USLE-K算法主要需要土壤物理和化学性质的数据，如颗粒大小、有机质、结构和渗透性。相比之下，基于平均几何颗粒大小的算法可能更专注于土壤颗粒的几何分布，可能需要不同或额外的土壤质地和成分数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the resolution of soil property data from SoilGrids impact the calculation of soil erodibility factor (K) compared to datasets with different spatial resolutions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 土壤属性数据的分辨率如何影响土壤侵蚀性因子（K）的计算，特别是与不同空间分辨率的数据集相比？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The SoilGrids dataset, originally with a 7.5 arc-second resolution and resampled to 30 arc-second for analysis, provides a higher spatial resolution than some other datasets. This higher resolution allows for more detailed and potentially more accurate calculations of the soil erodibility factor (K), as it can capture finer spatial variations in soil properties.
Comparison.AnswerCn: SoilGrids 数据集最初具有 7.5 弧秒的分辨率，并在分析中重采样为 30 弧秒，这提供了比其他一些数据集更高的空间分辨率。这种更高的分辨率允许对土壤侵蚀性因子 (K) 进行更详细和潜在更准确的计算，因为它能够捕捉土壤特性中的更细微空间变化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the presence of rock fragments in soil profiles influence the accuracy of soil erodibility factor calculations across different regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 岩石碎片在土壤剖面中的存在如何影响不同地区土壤侵蚀性因子计算的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The presence of rock fragments in soil profiles can significantly impact the soil erodibility factor calculations by increasing the soil's permeability and lowering saturated hydraulic conductivity, which affects water infiltration and runoff. This variation can lead to different erodibility factors in areas with varying rock fragment content.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 土壤剖面中岩石碎片的存在可以显著影响土壤侵蚀性因子的计算，因为它会增加土壤的渗透性并降低饱和水力导度，从而影响水的入渗和径流。这种变化可能导致岩石碎片含量不同的地区侵蚀性因子的差异。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in resampling soil data from a higher resolution to a lower one, and how could these affect the interpretation of soil erosion rates?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从更高分辨率的土壤数据重新采样到较低分辨率时，可能会出现哪些挑战，这些挑战如何影响土壤侵蚀率的解释？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Resampling soil data from a higher resolution (7.5 arc seconds) to a lower one (30 arc seconds) may lead to loss of detail and introduction of generalized data points, which can affect the precision of soil erosion rate calculations, potentially overlooking localized variations in soil properties and rock fragment content.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 将土壤数据从更高分辨率（7.5弧秒）重采样到较低分辨率（30弧秒）可能会导致细节丢失和引入概括化的数据点，这可能会影响土壤侵蚀率计算的精确性，可能忽视土壤特性和岩石碎片含量的局部变化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can the inclusion of gravel coverage on soil surfaces alter the interpretation of soil erosion data and mapping accuracy?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在土壤表面覆盖碎石的情况下，如何影响土壤侵蚀数据的解读和制图准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The inclusion of gravel coverage on soil surfaces can alter the interpretation of soil erosion data by reducing soil erodibility, protecting the soil from raindrop impact and runoff, and thereby lowering the calculated soil erosion rates. This consideration enhances mapping accuracy by accounting for surface protection factors.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在土壤表面覆盖碎石的情况下，土壤侵蚀数据的解读可能会发生变化，因为碎石可以降低土壤的侵蚀性，保护土壤免受雨滴冲击和径流的影响，从而降低计算出的土壤侵蚀率。这一考虑通过考虑表面保护因素，提高了制图的准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying reasons for the lack of global correction methods for calculating soil erodibility factors considering rock fragment content?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 缺乏全球修正方法来计算考虑岩石碎片含量的土壤侵蚀性因子的潜在原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges in global correction methods arise because existing studies have not fully incorporated the impact of profile rock fragments and rock fragment cover on soil erodibility, despite their recognized influence in specific soil erosion models.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 全球修正方法中的挑战在于，现有研究尚未充分考虑岩石碎片和岩石碎片覆盖对土壤侵蚀性影响，尽管它们在特定土壤侵蚀模型中被认可为重要因素。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the differences in soil erodibility factor (K) values across different global regions when accounting for rock fragment content?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在考虑岩石碎片含量的情况下，导致不同全球地区土壤侵蚀性因子（K）值差异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Differences in K values across regions are due to the varying influence of rock fragments in the soil profile and on the surface, which can increase or decrease soil permeability and erosion rates depending on their presence and distribution.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 不同地区的K值差异是由于岩石碎片在土壤剖面和表面上的影响不同，这可能根据它们的存在和分布增加或减少土壤的渗透性和侵蚀率。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects on soil erodibility factor (K) when incorporating data on rock fragments in soil profiles and surface gravels into the calculation?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在计算土壤侵蚀性因子（K）时，纳入土壤剖面和表面砾石中的岩石碎片数据可能会产生哪些潜在影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Incorporating data on rock fragments in soil profiles and surface gravels into the calculation can lead to an increased soil erodibility factor (K) by 4.43% and enhance soil permeability by 5.68% on average. Additionally, it can decrease soil saturated hydraulic conductivity by 11.57%, affecting the water infiltration rate and increasing surface runoff. The presence of gravels on the surface can further reduce K by 18.7% due to protection against rain and runoff, potentially lowering soil K by 5.52% when both factors are considered.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将土壤剖面和表层砾石中的岩石碎片数据纳入计算，可以使土壤侵蚀性系数（K）平均增加4.43%，并提高土壤渗透性5.68%。此外，这还可能使土壤饱和水力导 conductivity降低11.57%，影响水的入渗速率并增加地表径流。表面砾石的存在进一步使K降低18.7%，因为它对雨水和径流提供了保护，当考虑这两个因素时，土壤K可能降低5.52%。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the inclusion of soil texture classes and rock fragment content data at a 30 arc-second resolution impact global soil erosion mapping accuracy?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 土壤纹理类别和岩石碎片含量数据以30弧秒分辨率纳入全球土壤侵蚀制图的准确性有何影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Including soil texture classes and rock fragment content data at a 30 arc-second resolution impacts global soil erosion mapping accuracy by enabling a more precise assessment of soil erodibility factor (K) changes. The joint effect of rock fragments in the profile and gravels on the surface can lead to an 11.8% reduction in soil erosion rates in sample areas, enhancing the accuracy of regional soil erosion maps by accounting for these variables.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 包括土壤质地类别和岩石碎片含量数据在30弧秒分辨率下，能够提高全球土壤侵蚀制图的准确性，从而更精确地评估土壤侵蚀因子（K）的变化。土壤剖面中的岩石碎片和表面的砾石的联合影响可以导致样本区域土壤侵蚀率减少11.8%，通过考虑这些变量，增强了区域土壤侵蚀图的准确性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences on soil erosion rate calculations when different algorithms for estimating soil erodibility factors are applied globally?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 当在全球范围内应用不同算法来估算土壤侵蚀性因子时，对土壤侵蚀率计算的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Applying different algorithms for estimating soil erodibility factors globally can result in varying consequences on soil erosion rate calculations. For instance, the influence of rock fragments can decrease the soil K value by 0.0091(t·hm2·h)·(hm–2·MJ–1·mm–1) in some regions, while increasing it by 0.0019(t·hm2·h)·(hm–2·MJ–1·mm–1) in others. Overall, the joint effect of rock fragments in the profile and surface gravels can reduce soil erosion rates by 11.8% in specific areas, highlighting the need for algorithmic precision in calculations.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 应用不同算法来估算全球土壤易蚀性因子可能会导致土壤侵蚀率计算结果的差异。例如，岩石碎片的影响在某些地区可以使土壤K值降低0.0091(t·hm²·h)·(hm⁻²·MJ⁻¹·mm⁻¹)，而在其他地区则可能增加0.0019(t·hm²·h)·(hm⁻²·MJ⁻¹·mm⁻¹)。总体而言，土壤剖面中的岩石碎片和表面砾石的联合效应可以在特定区域减少土壤侵蚀率11.8%，这突显了计算中算法精确性的必要性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What objectives might drive the development of a dataset focusing on soil erodibility factors across diverse global regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发一个关注全球不同地区土壤可蚀性因素的数据集可能有哪些目标？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective could be to provide essential data for regional soil erosion surveys and improve mapping accuracy using models like USLE/CSLE, by considering variations in soil physical and chemical properties, and rock fragment content.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是为区域土壤侵蚀调查提供基本数据，并通过考虑土壤物理和化学性质以及岩石碎片含量的变化，利用USLE/CSLE等模型提高制图精度。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to incorporate both rock fragments in the soil profile and surface gravels when creating datasets aimed at understanding soil erosion?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在创建旨在理解土壤侵蚀的数据集时，纳入土壤剖面中的岩石碎片和表面砾石是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Incorporating both factors is important because they jointly affect soil erosion rates by altering soil hydrology, reducing soil erodibility, and thereby impacting the accuracy of soil erosion mapping.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 结合这两个因素是重要的，因为它们共同影响土壤侵蚀率，通过改变土壤水文、降低土壤侵蚀性，从而影响土壤侵蚀制图的准确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What could be the rationale for resampling high-resolution soil data to a lower resolution when creating datasets for large-scale soil erosion analysis?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在创建大规模土壤侵蚀分析的数据集时，将高分辨率土壤数据重新采样到较低分辨率的理由是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Resampling to a lower resolution might be necessary to facilitate the integration of soil data with other geospatial datasets, ensure computational efficiency, and match the scale required for regional or global soil erosion analysis.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 降采样到较低分辨率可能是必要的，以便将土壤数据与其他地理空间数据集集成，确保计算效率，并匹配区域或全球土壤侵蚀分析所需的尺度。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in resampling soil property data from the original 7.5 arc seconds resolution to 30 arc seconds for analysis?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 将原始7.5弧秒分辨率的土壤属性数据重新采样到30弧秒以进行分析涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data from SoilGrids, which originally has a resolution of 7.5 arc seconds, is resampled to a resolution of 30 arc seconds during the analysis process. This involves updating the resolution of the soil type maps and soil property maps, such as the surface layer 0-15 cm and soil surface data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: SoilGrids的数据最初具有7.5弧秒的分辨率，在分析过程中被重新采样为30弧秒的分辨率。这涉及到更新土壤类型图和土壤属性图，例如表层0-15厘米和土壤表面数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can the influence of rock fragments in the soil profile and surface gravels be incorporated into the calculation of the soil erodibility factor (K)?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何将土壤剖面中的岩石碎片和表面砾石的影响纳入土壤侵蚀性因子（K）的计算中？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The influence of rock fragments, including those in the soil profile and gravels on the surface, is assessed using equations like Brakensiek's for the relationship between saturated hydraulic conductivity and soil permeability, and Poesen's equation for soil erodibility attenuation under rock fragment cover. These factors are integrated into the calculation of K to reflect their impact on soil erosion rates.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 岩石碎片的影响，包括土壤剖面中的碎片和表面的砾石，使用布拉肯西克方程评估饱和导水率与土壤渗透率之间的关系，以及波森方程评估岩石碎片覆盖下土壤侵蚀性衰减。这些因素被整合到K的计算中，以反映它们对土壤侵蚀率的影响。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are used to evaluate the impact of rock fragment content on soil hydrology and erosion processes globally?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 评估岩石碎片含量对土壤水文和侵蚀过程影响的方法在全球范围内有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Methods include using available data on the content of rock fragments and soil texture classes, with calculations based on relationships such as those defined by Brakensiek and Poesen. These methods assess the effects of rock fragments in the soil profile and on the surface on soil erodibility and hydrology, considering their impact on saturated hydraulic conductivity and surface runoff.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 方法包括利用岩石碎片的成分和土壤质地类别的可用数据，基于Brakensiek和Poesen定义的关系进行计算。这些方法评估了土壤剖面和表面上岩石碎片的影响，考虑了它们对土壤侵蚀性和水文的影响，包括对饱和导水率和地表径流的影响。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the calculation of soil erodibility factors (K) using data on rock fragments and soil texture classes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法可以利用岩石碎片和土壤质地类别的数据来计算土壤侵蚀性因子（K）？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Methodologies such as the USLE-K algorithm, RUSLE2-K algorithm, EPIC-K algorithm, and algorithms based on average geometric particle size enable the calculation of soil erodibility factors (K) by utilizing data on rock fragments and soil texture classes. These methods consider soil physical and chemical properties, including particle size, organic matter, structure, and permeability.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 诸如USLE-K算法、RUSLE2-K算法、EPIC-K算法以及基于平均几何粒径的算法等方法，通过利用岩石碎片和土壤质地类别的数据，能够计算土壤侵蚀性因子（K）。这些方法考虑了土壤的物理和化学性质，包括颗粒大小、有机质、结构和渗透性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of rock fragment content data influence the accuracy of soil erosion mapping using global datasets?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 岩石碎片含量数据的整合如何影响使用全球数据集进行土壤侵蚀制图的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of rock fragment content data influences the accuracy of soil erosion mapping by accounting for the effects of rock fragments in the soil profile and gravels on the soil surface. This integration can reduce the soil erosion rate by 11.8% in sample areas and improves the accuracy of regional soil erosion maps by considering both profile rock fragments and surface gravels.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 岩石碎片含量数据的整合影响土壤侵蚀制图的准确性，因为它考虑了土壤剖面中的岩石碎片和表面砾石的影响。这种整合可以在样本区域减少11.8%的土壤侵蚀率，并通过同时考虑剖面岩石碎片和表面砾石，提高区域土壤侵蚀图的准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges are faced in developing global correction methods for soil erodibility factors considering rock fragment content?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在考虑岩石碎片含量的情况下，开发全球土壤侵蚀性因子的修正方法面临哪些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: One of the challenges in developing global correction methods for soil erodibility factors considering rock fragment content is the lack of a global correction method and result for calculating soil erodibility factors that take into account the content of rock fragments. Additionally, existing studies have not adequately considered the impact of profile rock fragments and rock fragment cover on soil erodibility.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在考虑岩石碎片含量的土壤侵蚀性因子的全球修正方法开发中，面临的挑战之一是缺乏全球修正方法和结果来计算土壤侵蚀性因子，同时考虑岩石碎片的含量。此外，现有研究尚未充分考虑剖面岩石碎片和岩石碎片覆盖对土壤侵蚀性的影响。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the integration of rock fragment content into soil erodibility factor calculations not yield the expected improvements in mapping accuracy?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 将岩石碎片含量纳入土壤侵蚀性因子计算中，可能不会带来预期的映射准确性提升，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Despite the mention of rock fragments' influence on soil erodibility factors in manuals like RUSLE, studies have not fully considered their impact in calculations. This oversight may be due to the lack of a global correction method for calculating soil erodibility factors with rock fragment content, which could affect the expected improvements in mapping accuracy.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 尽管在像RUSLE这样的手册中提到了岩石碎片对土壤侵蚀性因子的影响，但研究并未充分考虑它们在计算中的作用。这一疏忽可能是由于缺乏一种全球性的修正方法来计算含有岩石碎片的土壤侵蚀性因子，这可能会影响预期的制图准确性提升。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential challenges of resampling soil property data from a 7.5 arc-second to a 30 arc-second resolution for soil erodibility analysis?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在将土壤属性数据从7.5弧秒重采样到30弧秒分辨率进行土壤侵蚀性分析时，可能面临的挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Resampling soil property data to a coarser resolution might lead to loss of detail, potentially affecting the precision of local soil erodibility estimates. The challenge lies in balancing data manageability with the need for fine-scale accuracy in representing soil characteristics and erosion dynamics.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 将土壤属性数据重新采样到较粗的分辨率可能会导致细节丧失，从而影响局部土壤侵蚀性估计的精确性。挑战在于平衡数据的可管理性与在表示土壤特征和侵蚀动态方面对细尺度准确性的需求。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your assessment of the comprehensiveness of soil datasets like SoilGrids for capturing regional variations in soil erosion influenced by rock fragments?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您如何评估像SoilGrids这样的土壤数据集在捕捉受岩石碎片影响的区域土壤侵蚀变化方面的全面性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Soil datasets like SoilGrids are comprehensive as they include detailed maps of soil properties; however, capturing regional variations in soil erosion influenced by rock fragments requires careful consideration of local heterogeneities and supplementary data to accurately reflect the influence of rock fragments on soil hydrology and erosion rates.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 土壤数据集如SoilGrids非常全面，因为它们包含了土壤特性的详细地图；然而，捕捉受岩石碎片影响的土壤侵蚀的区域变化需要仔细考虑地方异质性和补充数据，以准确反映岩石碎片对土壤水文和侵蚀速率的影响。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about how the presence of rock fragments can alter soil erosion calculations in different environments.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定岩石碎片的存在如何在不同环境中改变土壤侵蚀计算。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Rock fragments in the soil profile and on the surface can significantly affect soil erosion calculations by altering parameters such as the soil erodibility factor (K) and saturated hydraulic conductivity. The presence of rock fragments can increase soil permeability, reduce water infiltration, and protect soil surfaces from rain impact, thereby modifying erosion rates in varying environments.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 土壤剖面和表面的岩石碎片可以显著影响土壤侵蚀计算，因为它们改变了土壤侵蚀性系数（K）和饱和水力导度等参数。岩石碎片的存在可以增加土壤的渗透性，减少水的入渗，并保护土壤表面免受降雨冲击，从而在不同环境中改变侵蚀速率。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of why it is challenging to incorporate rock fragment content into global soil erodibility datasets.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么将岩石碎片含量纳入全球土壤侵蚀性数据集是具有挑战性的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Despite the recognition of rock fragments' impact on soil erodibility, there is no established global correction method for incorporating rock fragment content into soil erodibility factors. Challenges include the need for comprehensive data on rock fragment distribution and the complexity of accurately modeling their influence on soil properties at a global level.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 尽管认识到岩石碎片对土壤侵蚀性影响的重要性，但尚未建立全球范围内将岩石碎片含量纳入土壤侵蚀性因子的修正方法。面临的挑战包括需要全面的数据来了解岩石碎片的分布，以及在全球范围内准确建模它们对土壤性质影响的复杂性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the methods used to calculate soil erodibility factor (K) and identify the challenges in incorporating rock fragment content into these calculations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨用于计算土壤侵蚀性因子（K）的方法，并识别在这些计算中纳入岩石碎片含量所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methods used to calculate soil erodibility factor (K) include algorithms like USLE-K, RUSLE2-K, EPIC-K, and models based on average geometric particle size. These methods consider soil physical and chemical properties such as particle size, organic matter, structure, and permeability. The challenge in incorporating rock fragment content is that existing studies have not fully explored the impact of profile rock fragments and rock fragment cover on soil erodibility. There is currently no global correction method for calculating soil erodibility factors that account for rock fragment content.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 计算土壤侵蚀性因子（K）的方法包括USLE-K、RUSLE2-K、EPIC-K等算法，以及基于平均几何粒径的模型。这些方法考虑了土壤的物理和化学特性，如粒径、有机质、结构和渗透性。纳入岩石碎片含量的挑战在于，现有研究尚未充分探讨剖面岩石碎片和岩石碎片覆盖对土壤侵蚀性的影响。目前尚无全球性修正方法来计算考虑岩石碎片含量的土壤侵蚀性因子。
